salon: Visit our renewed salon, where the health of your skin will be in the best hands!
service1: Dermatology and traditional cosmetic treatments in one place!
service2: With my health education, I treat urgent skin problems quickly and efficiently!
service3: I work in a sterile environment and help uncover the root causes of skin problems.
motivationBody: We need intuition to see what a face could be like, deep motivation to persuade someone to transform, bulldog perseverance to continuously acquire knowledge, maximalism to do it at the same level every day, grateful love to be trusted, - This is what the students must swear by!
introduceBody1: With 30 years of professional experience, traditional cosmetic treatments with modern materials and technology, equipped with unique services such as:
introduceBody6: I am a beautician with a basic qualification in health care, in daily contact and consultation with dermatologists, plastic surgeons, and gynecologists in problematic cases. Medical cosmetics, sterile treatments all over the body, electrocoagulation removal of lesions such as:
introduceBody14: Call me with any questions about cosmetics, I will answer immediately!
